divs: sighting detailsbetween 9pm and 9:20pm there was a line of individual red lights flying towards you, red\orange when equal to your line of vision, there was no engine noise, they moved from west to east, pretty much equally spaced except for 2 that seemed to come into view at the same time, then moved apart to the same partern spacing. the lights never blinked, and the local airport has responed as no report.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in DeWitt
There were no other sightings in DeWitt on or around February 12th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Solid red red/orange lights in Michigan sky
